lines.gurmukhi: jw idn jgq mn tihl khI irswie gRXwn DRXwn kot jog jg n smwn hY
lines.transliteration_english: Jaa Din Jagat Man Tahil Kahee Risaai , Gyaan Dhyaan Kot Jog Jag N Samaan Hai ?

Shabad OS B.translation: The day Omniscient Lord felt pleased and ordered to perform service, millions of worldly knowledge, meditation, yoga became paltry on that auspicious day.

lines.gurmukhi: jw idn BeI pinhwrI jgn nwQ jI kI qw sm n CqRDwrI kotn kotwn hY
lines.transliteration_english: Jaa Din Bhaee Panihaaree Jagan Naad Jee Kee , Taa Sam N Chhatradhaaree Kotan Kotaan Hai ?

Shabad OS B.translation: The day I received the assignment of filling water for God, the master of the Universe, the comforts of millions of kingdoms cannot compare with that blessed day.

lines.gurmukhi: jw idn ipsnhwrI BeI jgjIvn kI ArQ Drm kwm moK dwsn dwswn hY
lines.transliteration_english: Jaa Din Pisanahaaree Bhaee Jagajeevan Kee , Arad Dharam Kaam Mokh Daasan Daasaan Hai ?

Shabad OS B.translation: The day I received the assignment of grinding the mill-stone of the Lord, the master of universe and all living beings, then the four much sought and desired elements of spirituality became slave of the servants.

lines.gurmukhi: iCrkwrI pinhwrI pIsnkwrI ko jo suK pRymnI ipAwrI ko AkQ aunmwn hY ]656]
lines.transliteration_english: Chhirakaaree Panihaaree Peesanakaaree Ko Jo Soukha , Praymanee Piaaree Ko Akad Ounamaan Hai ?656?

Shabad OS B.translation: The love-lorn beloved who is blessed with the task of sprinkling of water, grinding of mill-stone and filling of water, to state her praise, comfort and peace is beyond description.  (656)
